getTaskMetrics

public java.util.List getTaskMetrics()
Description copied from interface: Task
Returns the list of metrics associated with the task. For example, the rate at which a file transfer is occuring. Not all task types have taskMetrics associated with them, however, in which case this should return an empty list.

Specified by:
getTaskMetrics in interface Task
Returns:
The list of task metrics
